johnny__: 舉個例子... ?
for k, v of obj => ... ?
還是你要傳回值? zz = [k for k, v of obj when v is /matched/]
例如現在是指定某些 例如姓名黨籍，但這些現在source都有了，我只需要增加avator和id
x = array.map -> it.avatar = zzz; it.id = yyy; it
也可以寫 x = for y in array => y.avatar = zzz; y
see: lsc -ce 'x = for y in array => y.avatar = zzz; y'
(當然 => 處都可以變成換成 indent)
